Name: inject
Title: Sisyphus
Description:
[Injection track] (Regex, JCR SQL2, SOLR, MongoDB).

This is a simplified version of the HF2k16 injection track. That is there is no more difficulty selection and less server side validation to mess with your injection attempts.

You must search for the flags in the different datastore. Each flag have the format specified by the following regex /FLAG-[a-f0-9]{32}/. Still in the scoreboard you ONLY submit the flag value without the "FLAG-" prefix

For each type of injection, there are three stages:

  • Not blind
  • Blind
  • Blind + filtered

Hints:

  • Use the not blind injection stage to test your payload for the other stages
  • JCR SQL2 <> SQL thus SQLmap won't work
  • Read the specs of each Query language
  • The FLAG- prefix is key to solve some of the injection stages

http://sisyphus.poptheshell.com

Name: recon
Title: Recon
Description: Hi h4xors! There is a new organisation in town called “La poutine club”. Rumors says that they have created the most extraordinary meal ever, it’s called the “poutine”. However, it seems like this group is hidding something. I need you to recon this club to get as many infos as you can on their website and infrastructure. You can start here https://lapoutine.club/.

Name: bsg
Title: BS:G - CylonNet
Description: [Logic/IRC] The cylons are using weird techniques to gather up and communicate. Infiltrate their network, identify the operatives and attempt to take it down! Additional instructions here.

Name: sgcomplex
Title: Stargate Complex
Description: [Exploration/Scripting Track] An old man gave you the secret coordinates and his access code to the hidden location of the Giza StarGate, venture to this top-secret complex to discover then defeat the security mechanisms protecting the StarGate in order to travel to other worlds. Rumors says a status page can be found at http://stargate.poptheshell.com

Name: sgwormhole
Title: Stargate Wormholes
Description: [Bruteforce/Scripting] Once the StarGate is operational, find the correct coordinates to other StarGates all around the Milky Way. There is another rumor the other StarGates are broadcasting their coordinates thru the universe, however this has never been confirmed nor denied.

Name: sgmisc
Title: Stargate Miscellaneous
Description: Miscellaneous flags for the StarGate challenge

Name: bug
Title: Bug Bounty
Description: Bug Bounty Policy. Flags given for teams who raise security issues in the infrastructure. These are one timers.

Name: bonus
Title: Bonus
Description: Bonus Flags are used for non-standard flag types. For example, to give a bonus when a track is completed, a bonus flag is created and assigned to the team

Name: breach
Title: Breach
Description: Hi we need your help. Ours cpanel web server got hack ! You need to help us find who did this and how ! you can dowload a pcap file and the audit log of the server. here
